title: At least 34 people killed in Russian ballistic missile attack on Sumy
snippets: Photos and videos of the aftermath show bloodied bodies scattered in the streets around the impact of the missiles.
summary: A missile strike resulted in multiple casualties, with photos and videos revealing bloodied bodies in the streets surrounding the impact area. The visual evidence highlights the severe aftermath of the attack.
titles: At least 34 people killed in Russian ballistic missile attack on Sumy

title: Myanmar military government defends rule minutes before deadly quake hits
snippets: Moments before Myanmar’s deadliest quake in a century, General Zaw Min Tun defended military rule, dismissed war crimes
summary: Just before Myanmar experienced its most devastating earthquake in 100 years, General Zaw Min Tun, a top military official, publicly defended the country's military governance and denied any allegations of war crimes. This statement came amid ongoing international scrutiny over the military's actions and human rights record.
titles: Myanmar military government defends rule minutes before deadly quake hits

title: At least 34 killed in Russian attack on Ukraine’s Sumy condemned by EU, US
snippets: Ukraine's president calls for a global response to the attack that killed and wounded more than a hundred people.
titles: At least 34 killed in Russian attack on Ukraine’s Sumy condemned by EU, US

title: India deploys troops after deadly protests over Muslim endowment bill
snippets: West Bengal leader Mamata Banerjee appeals for calm, saying Waqf Amendment Act will not be ‘applicable’ in state.
summary: West Bengal's Chief Minister, Mamata Banerjee, has called for peace among the public, stating that the Waqf Amendment Act will not be implemented in the state. Her appeal aims to quell any unrest or concern regarding the act's application in West Bengal.
titles: India deploys troops after deadly protests over Muslim endowment bill

title: China says US tariff exemptions ‘small step in correcting wrong practice’
snippets: Beijing calls on Washington to 'completely cancel' its reciprocal tariffs amid an escalating trade war.
summary: Beijing has urged Washington to fully eliminate reciprocal tariffs as part of efforts to de-escalate the ongoing trade war between the two countries. This request highlights the tensions in trade relations and signifies China's push for resolution.
titles: China says US tariff exemptions ‘small step in correcting wrong practice’

title: Bremen deals Stuttgart its club-record 5th straight Bundesliga loss at home
snippets: Oliver Burke scored in the last minute for Werder Bremen to win 2-1 and condemn Stuttgart to its fifth consecutive Bundesliga loss at home on Sunday.  Stuttgart was holding on following the debatable sending off of Nick Woltemade with his second yellow card in the 56th minute, but it looked like the home team had done enough for the draw until Leonardo Bittencourt set up Burke to score his second goal in the 90th minute.  Leonidas Stergiou got Stuttgart off to a good start in the 19th before Burke equalized in the 32nd.
summary: Oliver Burke scored a last-minute goal for Werder Bremen, securing a 2-1 victory over Stuttgart, which marked Stuttgart's fifth consecutive Bundesliga home loss. The match saw Stuttgart reduced to ten men after Nick Woltemade received a second yellow card in the 56th minute. Despite Stuttgart's efforts to hold on for a draw, Burke's goal in the 90th minute, assisted by Leonardo Bittencourt, sealed their fate. Leonidas Stergiou had initially put Stuttgart ahead in the 19th minute before Burke's first equalizer in the 32nd.
titles: Bremen deals Stuttgart its club-record 5th straight Bundesliga loss at home

title: Former LSU WR Kyren Lacy found dead after suicide
snippets: Promising young WR Kyren Lacy was found dead on Sunday from suicide
summary: Kyren Lacy, a promising young wide receiver, was found dead on Sunday, with the cause of death confirmed as suicide.
titles: Former LSU WR Kyren Lacy found dead after suicide

title: Former LSU receiver Lacy found dead at age 24
snippets: Former LSU receiver Kyren Lacy was found dead Saturday night in Houston, an LSU official confirmed to ESPN.
summary: Former LSU receiver Kyren Lacy was confirmed dead by an LSU official, as reported by ESPN. His body was discovered Saturday night in Houston. The circumstances surrounding his death have not been disclosed.
titles: Former LSU receiver Lacy found dead at age 24

title: Paddy Pimblett explains why UFC 314 callout list didn't include Ilia Topuria
snippets: MIAMI – Paddy Pimblett made a statement with his performance Saturday at UFC 314. He then made a callout, or a series of them, on the microphone. Four names came to mind: Justin Gaethje, Dustin Poirier, Charles Oliveira, and Arman Tsarukyan. One name was…
summary: At UFC 314 in Miami, Paddy Pimblett delivered a noteworthy performance and subsequently called out four fighters: Justin Gaethje, Dustin Poirier, Charles Oliveira, and Arman Tsarukyan, indicating his interest in facing them in future bouts. This move highlights Pimblett's ambitions in the UFC lightweight division.
titles: Paddy Pimblett explains why UFC 314 callout list didn't include Ilia Topuria

title: US tech tariff exemption may only be temporary, says Lutnick
snippets: Commerce secretary says products given reprieve will fall under separate regime
titles: US tech tariff exemption may only be temporary, says Lutnick

title: UK suspends import tariffs to ease strain for British businesses
snippets: Levies cut on 89 products to support domestic companies against Trump’s trade war
summary: In response to the trade war initiated by President Trump, a country has reduced tariffs on 89 products. This move is aimed at bolstering domestic companies by making imported raw materials cheaper, thereby supporting local industries affected by the trade conflict.
titles: UK suspends import tariffs to ease strain for British businesses

title: UK races to secure coal needed to keep British Steel furnaces burning
snippets: Officials work to ensure shipments arrive in time after emergency government rescue
summary: Officials have successfully intervened with an emergency government rescue to ensure that shipments arrive on time. This action was taken to address delays and prevent further disruption. The current status is that the intervention has been effective, with shipments now expected to meet their delivery schedules.
titles: UK races to secure coal needed to keep British Steel furnaces burning

title: China is well positioned to weather Trump’s trade war
snippets: Five years of export controls have helped it get very good at making things without American technology
summary: After five years of export controls aimed at limiting its access to American technology, the subject country has significantly improved its capability to manufacture goods independently of U.S. technological input. This development indicates a notable adaptation and enhancement in its domestic production capabilities.
titles: China is well positioned to weather Trump’s trade war

title: Arrest warrant issued for Tulip Siddiq in Bangladesh
snippets: Former City minister denies corruption charges that she and family members unlawfully acquired land near Dhaka
summary: A former City minister has refuted allegations of corruption, specifically the illegal acquisition of land near Dhaka involving her family members. The charges suggest that the minister and relatives unlawfully obtained property, but she denies these claims. The current status of the case or the outcome of these allegations was not provided in the information available.
titles: Arrest warrant issued for Tulip Siddiq in Bangladesh
